revised_title: Ritualized Gesture and Expression in Art and Life
tldr: This article discusses the interaction between ritualized gestures and expressions in art and life. It explores the relationship between symbolic rituals, such as oath-taking, and the visible signs of emotions, known as symptoms. The author examines various examples of art and gestures, including the use of the hand on the heart, to understand the connection between the symbolic and the expressive in human communication.
